text: I bought this product a little affraid that my results on using it on skin or hair wasn't going to be the same or even close to those who talked great about it, well the joke is on me because it is amazing and it leaves my skin and hair soft all day, I don't eat it because I wouldn't like for it to give me any side effects, not that I've heard of any so far but I don't want to risk it. I recommend this product 100% to all that want beautiful sof skin and shiny and sof hair.
